episodes.title: The Mexico-Malawi Double Standard
episodes.description:
Many Jehovah's Witnesses -- especially the older ones -- remember the graphic reports of severe persecution against the Jehovah's Witness brothers and sisters in the country of Malawi several decades ago, simply because the Malawian congregations refused to compromise their Christian neutrality. What wasn't publicized was THIS: At the same time the Malawi congregations were enduring brutal persecution for their Christian neutrality, the Mexican congregations were allowed by the Watchtower Society to compromise their Christian neutrality. 

Malawi Congress Party Card, copyrighted photos
http://marvinshilmer.blogspot.com/2010/05/malawi-congress-party-card.html
